name: gabby

A gabby person talks a lot or too much: The leading performances are faultless, with Jones as a gabby race commentator. He is pretty gabby: he asks a lot of questions and is always keen to get into a discussion.
More examplesFewer examplesHe learned the art of narrative from his gabby grandfather.John is a gabby salesman; Ian, his friend, is a shy and introverted priest.A family phone plan is often the cheapest option, but one gabby family member can use up all the minutes.
